summary:
Highly motivated, ambitious and eager to build my career, currently studying Bachelor(Information Technology) at Hogeschool Rotterdam. Life is a journey of learning and I am always up for new challenges so learning and developing new skills are a priority. I am very adaptive, a pro-active person with a result-oriented mindset. I speak three languages (Arabic, English and Dutch). 
I enjoy traveling and working in a multinational environment. I like electronics and programming so I am studying now Information Technology at the Hogeschool Rotterdam.

During my first year and second year i learned Python/Django, C#, Android studio(Java and XML), react, NodeJS, PostgreSQL and Firebase.

In my third year, I started my training at Rabobank and learned to analyze and perform performance tests for several existing and new features of Rabobank applications. In this year also I am following a minor about Artificial Intelligence(AI). Where i learn machine learning and deep learning algorithms and structures also I made a project with 3 other students. This project was a prototype for AI glass for blind people where the blind people can see through the technology of AI. We made a programme to take capture from the camera and speaking the result of that caption to the blind people, which I really enjoyed that project. 

In my fourth year I did a minor towards leadership in healthcare. During this minor I learned several things about leadership in a company or organization. I also had to do research with 4 other nursing students for Erasmus MC and IT Campus. This research was about e-consultancy within Erasmus MC and we achieved a good result during this research.

I started also my self-educated and developed my programming skills by following a bootcamp, called the “Samen Programmeren” programme”, that aimed at HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Materialize, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery, Algorithm, Git, GitHub, Scrum Framework, Trello and developing skills concerning the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React and Nodejs).

profile_positions.description: At Rabobank, I optimize application performance for mobile and online banking platforms while developing automated testing tools in a dynamic DevOps environment. Passionate about collaboration and continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer B

profile_positions.description: As a front-end performance engineer, I am part of the PCC (Performance Competency Center) and I perform performance tests for several existing and new features of Rabobank applications, developed by native developers teams. Rabobank Mobiel Bankieren, Rabobank Bankieren online, performance monitoring
profile_positions.title: Junior Front-end Performance Engineer

profile_positions.description: As an intern front-end performance engineer, I researched the performance of various Rabobank applications at the front-end level. I tried to answer the question "How can I check and analyze the performance inefficiencies of Rabobank application at the front end level?" Based on my research, I was able to advise on possible improvements in Rabobank.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Performance Engineering intern

profile_positions.description: Supervise new status holders to start study within university of application Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Student Mentor

volunteer_experiences.description: I have given lessons to old people about how they can use the computer and internet.

Building website and applications to make the communication within the organization easier.
Supporting the technical design process by participating in the analysis of technical application requirements.

skills: Being able to work together in a team
I adjust to situations quickly and easily
